data.text:
@yvessmith I've been griping about this for days and I submitted a correction to the @AP and have had no response yet.
https://t.co/TsTpwPMgTu
@yvessmith And completely ignores the individual dangers and long-term community impact of Long Covid. As someone in a high risk group I feel thoroughly screwed.

@yvessmith The actual efficacy of universal masking has always been questionable, but the campaign to terrify people into wearing them has been so highly successful it's pointless to even suggest continuing mandates is pointless for the general public.
